item.title: Hotel-X: API Reference
item.description:
Our reference pages explain all aspects of our GraphQL schema. These pages are divided into the following sections: Schema: Explains how our Schema works and the two key operations: Queries and Mutations Objects: A complete list of all objects in our schema, their definitions, what fields they use and when they are mandatory. role=“alert”>We are currently building out examples for every Object page. Please send us a Pull request if you would like to see an example for a particular Object, or if you would like to share your own example with the TravelgateX community.
[...]

item.title: Hotel-X: Plugins
item.description:
HotelX Plugins are the secret sauce of the HotelX API. They can be used to fully customize the request and response in any way one can think. HotelX Plugins are a separate Go application, that get compiled into the main application and run natively in our servers. Anyone can write a HotelX Plugin, and which Plugins get executed can be specified at the request level, or be configured by default.
[...]

item.title: Hotel-X: FAQs
item.description:
General Where can I find object explanations/definitions? You can find it on our Schema Which are the languages allowed in HotelX? The new aggregator allows every language, it will depend on each supplier. In aggregator mode, is it possible to set a time out for each provider? No, the time out will be applied to all providers, using the parameter setting: timeout. Is it possible to see the whole list of providers and to look at their hotel databases and prices somewhere?
[...]

item.title: Hotel-X: Release Notes
item.description: <a href="/hotel-x/release-notes/roadmap/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-road"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Roadmap</h3> <p>We have put together a GitHub Project where we will keep updating on the things weâ€™ve in our plans.</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/hotel-x/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons"><img width="24px" src="/images/graphql.svg"/></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">GraphQL Schema Changes</h3> <p>It includes backwards-compatible changes, schema previews, and upcoming breaking changes.</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/hotel-x/release-notes/breaking-changes/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-eraser"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">GraphQL Schema breaking changes</h3> <p>Changes history of deprecated notes previously announced</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/hotel-x/release-notes/changelog/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-commenting-o "></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Hotel-X Changelog</h3> </div> </div> </a>
